bugfix.public: Only when /auctioneer embed = off: Moving the mouse over an item in your bagpack while there was already an item shown using a chatlink, the old enhTooltip disappeared while the WoW-Iteminfo was still displayed. Now the EnhTooltip will be displayed again, when you no longer mouse over the bagpackitem.

bugfix.developer: The WoW parameters of the function "ChatFrame_OnHyperlinkShow" was changed in WoW 1.6.0.
bugfix.public: The rightclickmenu on characternames in the chatmenu works again. Thx to pandarus for providing the patch.

bugfix.developer: The reported error had been caused by a bug in ItemsMatrix. IM's function: ItemsMatrix_GetHyperlink returned nil because of an error which caused a nil error in TT_IMInv_ItemButton_OnEnter. As fakeLink is a global function (TT_FakeLink), I changed that function to be nilsafe, so it won't cause any more errormessages for users, even if external addons cause trouble.
bugfix.public: Fixed the "attempt to call global `ItemsMatrix_GetHyperlink' (a nil value)"-bug (you should upgrade ItemsMatrix to version 15 or greater, too!)

bugfix.developer: changed the line: "elseif (parentRect.r + width < sWidth * 0.8) then" to "elseif (parentRect.r + width > sWidth * 0.8) then" as suggested by the sourceforgeuser (see sourceforgeid).
bugfix.public: the tooltip could swap over the right side of the window

added.developer: Added a new optional parameter to TT_GetTextGSC, to allow the exact amount being print to the tooltip. If the second parameter is set to true, the amount of copper will also be printed out, even if the given money value is > 1g. That functionality was needed to print the correct suggested price to the tooltip.
